questions.answer: Dr. Shrinivasa Rao B.R. teaches subjects such as Heat Transfer, Kinematics of Machines, Dynamics of Machines, Conventional Energy Conversion Systems, Theory of SI and CI Engines, Wind Energy Systems, and Automotive Engineering.
